THE JOURNEY

Here, I'm not only meaning to the EP but alos this single. I was afraid of releasing my music on YouTube until The Journey. I decided to release it anyway and share it with others and I had an unexpected support from the community, even if I was unexperienced releasing my music. The emotions that I shared through this EP were hapiness, motivation and superation. Which were emotions that I was getting exposed to almost 1 year ago (january 2022). I loved to work on The Journey, and the single was the first Progressive House track that I made.
